scripts.prebuild: set -e; SITE=exampleSite; THEME1="$SITE/themes/webstack-hugo"; THEME2="$SITE/themes/WebStack-Hugo"; rm -rf "$THEME1" "$THEME2"; mkdir -p "$THEME1" "$THEME2"; tar --exclude='./exampleSite' --exclude='./node_modules' --exclude='./.git' --exclude='./.github' --exclude='./.hugo_build.lock' --exclude='./public' -cf - . | tar -C "$THEME1" -xf -; tar --exclude='./exampleSite' --exclude='./node_modules' --exclude='./.git' --exclude='./.github' --exclude='./.hugo_build.lock' --exclude='./public' -cf - . | tar -C "$THEME2" -xf -
